Text: Thank you. I've been counting down the days for this to release.

Torrent is A+

But I have to say that some voices from Roy Dotrice kind of annoy me, Daenarys is a major example. Other readers from previous volumes did a better job imho.
Dotrice is awesome.  He read the first 3 books and was sorely missed for book 4.
will you be releasing a chaptered version like with books 1-4?

hate to do this to the uploader, but found a chapterized version with maps too ...
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6543910/A_Dance_With_Dragons_-_George_R.R._Martin_-_CHAPTERIZED
Next, The Winds of Winter, can't wait any faster :)
